title: William Dalrymple on the East India Company
itunes:title: William Dalrymple on the East India Company
itunes:subtitle: Historian and author William Dalrymple discusses his new book, The Anarchy, which reveals how a single London corporation took over the Mughal empire and became a major imperial power. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
William Dalrymple explains how a single London corporation took over the Mughal empire and became a major imperial power. Historyextra.com/podcast
